generated_body: In the article titled "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu," the user is likely to find an exploration of the strategic reasons behind the continued presence of this menu item. The piece may discuss factors such as consumer demand, seasonal sales trends, and its role in McDonald's marketing strategy, particularly around Lent when fish consumption typically increases. Additionally, the article could touch upon how the Filet-O-Fish compares to other menu items in terms of sales performance and customer satisfaction, providing insights into its unique place within the fast-food chain's offerings.
